title: GM Antonetti holds town hall with Tribe fans
subtitle: GM Antonetti holds town hall with Tribe fans
body: CLEVELAND -- The older gentleman who stepped up to the microphone had heard enough of the serious baseball discussion for the time being. He greeted Indians general manager Chris Antonetti and asked if it was fine to introduce some levity.  Antonetti laughed, and the man proceeded with his question during Friday's town hall meeting inside the Idea Center at Playhouse Square.  "My question of you," he said, "is when the Fausto Carmona facts became known, where were you, what was your first reaction and what did you do after that first reaction?"
